directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Mix cookie dough, softened butter, and egg together in a bowl.
Spread cookie dough mixture onto prepared pizza pan to cover entirely.
Bake in preheated oven until dough begins to brown, 10 to 12 minutes; set aside to cool.
Beat confectioners' sugar into peanut butter in a bowl until completely integrated.
Spread peanut butter mixture over cooled cookie dough crust.
Arrange halved peanut butter cups atop peanut butter layer.
Sprinkle chocolate chips around peanut butter cups.
ingredients: 1 (16.5 ounce) package refrigerated sugar cookie dough
15 miniature chocolate-covered peanut butter cups (such as Reese's®), halved
title: Peanut Butter Cup Dessert Pizza
